Она надеется, что ей не откажут в кредите и в скором времени она сможет отремонтировать дом и сделать его безопасным.
texts.en: Shahnozai is 22 years old and she lives with her parents in the Jilikul district of Tajikistan.  She works as a school teacher and she loves her job.  She really enjoys working with children and helping them with everything.  Shahnozai has applied for a loan to renovate her family's house.  It's been many years since her house has been renovated and it greatly needs some repairs.  Shahnoza would like her parents to live in a safe and comfortable house.  She hopes that this loan will be granted to her, so that she can quickly start renovating her family's house to make it safer.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies in order to renovate her house.

loans.name: Wilson Augusto

texts.es:
Wilson es un agricultor de la zona de sonson sus cultivos tienen destino de exportación a la ciudad de Medellín, trabaja como independiente desde el año 1992, desde ese tiempo se ha preocupado porque sus cultivos sean de calidad, extender sus zonas.
Wilson es padre de familia su hija de 2 años le ha dado n toque de felicidad a sus rutinas diarias y es por ella que quiere tener un cultivo grande.
Como en el momento no están en etapa de cosecha Wilson no cuenta con capital para el sostenimiento de sus cultivos necesita herbicidas, insecticidas, fungicidas, estos insumos tienen un costo muy elevado y como tiene varias hectáreas es por esto la razón pues quiere proteger absolutamente todo su cultivo.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de estos insumos agrícolas para seguir siendo un distribuir de confianza de las plazas de mercado de Medellín.
texts.en:
Wilson is a farmer in the Sonson zone. His crops are destined to be exported to the city of Medellín. He has worked independently since the year 1992. Since this time he has been concerned about having quality crops and extending his lands.

Wilson is the father of a family. His two-year-old daughter has given him a touch of happiness in his daily routines, and it is for her that he wants to have a big crop.

Since they are not in the harvest stage at this time, Wilson doesn't have capital to sustain his crops. He needs herbicides, insecticides, and fungicides. These supplies have a very elevated cost, and as he has a number of hectares, it is for this reason that he wants to absolutely protect all his plantings.

He is applying for a loan for the purchase of these agricultural supplies to continue being a reliable distributor in the market plazas of Medellín.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as herbicides, insecticides, and fungicides. The reason for the amount is that his land is a number of hectares and he needs to cover it all.

loans.name: Sanovbar

texts.ru: Сановбару 48 лет. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Дочь Сановбара работает преподавателем в школе. Старший сын находится за приделами родины на заработках, младший сын работает продавцом. Сановбар очень хочет отремонтировать свой дом, чтобы создать свои детям и мужу уют и удобства. Она приняла решение и обратилась за кредитом, чтобы отремонтировать дом. Ее семья поддержала в ее решение. Семейный бюджет не позволяет ей купить стройматериалы и ей остается только надеется на кредит.
texts.en: Sanovbar is 48 years old, married, and the mother of three children.  Her daughter works as a school teacher.  Her oldest son is currently working abroad, her youngest son works in retail.  Sanovbar really wants to renovate her house in order to make it comfortable and convenient for her husband and children.  She has therefore decided to apply for a loan which will help her to renovate her house.  Her family is supporting her with her decision.  As the family's budget is not sufficient to buy construction supplies, Sanovbar is relying on this loan.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothing for resale.

loans.name: Dorbeiro

texts.es:
Dorbeiro un joven de 21 años de edad, soltero solo con la responsabilidad de estudiar y apoyar incondicionalmente a su familia, que parte su día en dos, es estudiante y tiene un negocio de café-bar, el sueña con graduarse y ser un profesional mejorar sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de su familia. 
Vale la pena apoyar a este joven que hace un desgaste físico pero le toca, él dice que todo sacrificio será aceptado, y se encuentra muy feliz porque los resultados se están viendo, su rutina combinada de estudiante y trabajador le lleva más de 14 horas.
Tú puedes apoyar a este joven que necesita comprar surtido como lo son bebidas alcohólicas, comprar una licuadora para iniciar la venta de jugos naturales, y variedad de frutas.
texts.en: Dorbeiro is a 21 year old youth, single, his only responsibility is to study and support his family unconditionally. He divides his day in two as for part he is a student, and he has a coffee bar business. He dreams of graduating and being a professional improving his income and the quality of living of his family. It is worthwhile to support this young man who is making a physical sacrifice but he says any sacrifice is acceptable and feels very happy as he can see the results. His combined routine as a student and worker is more than 14 hours a day. You can support this youth who needs to buy an assortment of alcoholic beverages and buy a blender to start selling natural juices and a variety of fruits.

loans.use: to buy a variety of alcoholic drinks and a blender to make natural juices.

loans.name: Venancio

texts.es:
Venancio es de la ciudad de Santaní, esta estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, es una persona que se esta esforzando por poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida por medio de sus estudios. Comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso en invertirlo en el pago de sus gastos de titulación.
Hoy pide este nuevo préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de la universidad, y de esta forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Venancio is from the city of Santaní and is studying for a degree in Accounting. He is a person who is striving to improve his living conditions through his studies. Venancio says that his previous loan was invested in the payment of his degree fees.

Today he is requesting this new loan so that he can cover his university expenses. This will allow him to continue his studies just as before. He appreciates this new opportunity he has received so that he can keep growing as always.

loans.use: to pay his university expenses.

loans.name: Andry Judith

texts.es:
Andry es una mujer casada de 25 años de edad, vive con su esposo, quieren tener una armonía y buena calidad de vida, ella se ha desempeñado en su matrimonio como ama de casa, está tratando de conseguir empleo pero no lo ha logrado, por eso por consejo de un amigo se inscribió en un catálogo para iniciar la venta de productos de uso personal como lo son bebidas, de cuidado de personal y para el hogar.
Esta opción la tomo como necesidad económica para no dejar que su esposo cargue con todas las obligaciones financieras.
Con la ayuda de un préstamo Andry iniciara formalmente su vida como independiente, comprara productos de cuidado personal, de cuidado para la casa.
texts.en: Andry is a 25 year old married woman who lives with her husband. She wants to have a harmonious and good quality life. Her role in their marriage has been as a housewife. She tried to get work but didn't succeed. So a friend of hers advised her to enroll in catalog sales of  personal use items like drink, personal care items and housewares. She took this option out of economic necessity so as not to leave her husband with all the financial obligations. With the help of a loan Andry will formally start  her new independent life, buying personal care products and house care goods

loans.use: to start a business selling personal products and household products.

loans.name: 25 De Abril Group

texts.es:
Wilma es una mujer de 42 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, atenta, constante, responsable y trabajadora, su negocio lo desarrolla en la localidad de ‘El torno’ un área rural caracterizada por el comercio entre agricultores y comerciantes mayoristas que reparten la producción del campo a mercados de la ciudad. De clima cálido tropical y húmedo, con una temperatura constante entre 18-35 grados centígrados durante todo el día.
Wilma es de tez trigueña, cabello negro corto hasta la altura de los hombros, ojos obscuros, estatura mediana, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el negocio que realiza (de pie, la 2 de la derecha, viste blusa blanca), su vida la comparte con sus familiares que trabajan, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua de pozo y electricidad. Su sueño por tener su restaurante propio la llevó a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; comercio de verduras, venta de jugos típicos, horneados de masas tradicionales, carnicería, venta de chinelas, venta de ropa de segunda mano y venta de perfumes, para solicitar un préstamo y cumplir sus anhelos. Su negocio es la venta de comida típica a diferentes horas del día; por la mañana se encarga de la venta de humintas (choclo molido con queso envuelto en su chala, hervido en agua o horneado), a medio día se ocupa del almuerzo y la variedad de comidas varía según los ingredientes de temporada, como; masaco (yuca aplastada con queso), pacumutu (carne y yuca ensartadas en un palito, a la brasa), sonso de yuca (yuca aplastada y amasada con queso a la brasa), majadito (charque, arroz amarillo, huevo frito y plátano), y por las noches prepara los ingredientes para las comidas del día siguiente. “todas las noches preparo la comida para el día siguiente,  sólo debo freírlo o cocerlo, la comida tradicional es una herencia de mi familia…” comenta. Su sueño es abrir un restaurante i dejar de vender en la calle de forma ambulante, ella desea realizar la compra de utensilios de cocina como; cubiertos, ollas, sartenes, y otros para mejorar la calidad de su comida y atender a mayor cantidad de clientes. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Wilma solicita un préstamo para la compra de utensilios de cocina para mejorar la calidad de su comida y atender a mayor cantidad de clientes.
texts.en:
Wilma is a 42-year-old woman who is single and has no children. Her business involves selling traditional food. Wilma is an enterprising, independent, attentive, steadfast, responsible, and hardworking woman. She conducts her business in the town of El Torno, a rural area that is known for trade between farmers and wholesale vendors. Agricultural products are delivered to the markets in that city. The tropical weather is warm and humid. The temperature remains constant between 18 and 35 degrees Celsius throughout the day.

Wilma has an olive complexion, short black hair that reaches her shoulders, dark eyes, medium height, and a slim physique. Her native language is Guaraní, which is spoken among her family, but she also speaks Spanish as part of the general culture and for conducting business. In the photo, she is standing in the back, second to the right, and wearing a white blouse. She shares her life with her family members who also work. They live in a brick house that has well water and electricity. Her dream is to have her own restaurant.

Wilma is the leader of a Communal Bank that includes businesspeople who sell vegetables, sell traditional juices, produce traditional baked snacks, manage a butcher shop, sell slippers, sell secondhand clothes, and sell perfumes. They are requesting a loan so that they can fulfill their wishes.

Wilma’s business involves selling traditional food at different times of the day. In the morning, she sells “humintas” [a mixture of cornmeal and cheese wrapped in a husk, which is then boiled or baked]. At noon, she is busy preparing lunches that have a variety of dishes that contain seasonal ingredients. These foods include “masaco” [ground cassava with cheese], “pacumutu” [beef and cassava that is grilled on a skewer], “sonso de yuca” [a mixture of cassava flour and cheese that is roasted on a stick], and “majadito” [dried salted meat served with yellow rice, a fried egg, and plantains]. In the evenings, she prepares the ingredients for the dishes that will be served the following day. Wilma says, “Every night is spent preparing the ingredients for the following day’s meals since I do all of the frying and the cooking. Cooking this type of food is a tradition that has been passed down through my family.” Her dream is to open a restaurant so that she can stop selling on the street.

Wilma wants to buy cooking equipment such as cutlery, pots, frying pans, and other items so that she can improve the quality of her food and serve more customers. This is her second loan cycle with Emprender and she has been working in this business for 10 years.

For the reasons stated previously, Wilma is requesting a loan in order to buy cooking equipment so that she can improve the quality of her food and serve more customers.

loans.use: to buy cooking equipment so that she can improve the quality of her food and serve more customers.

loans.name: San Juan Bosco Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Juan Bosco está en su octavo ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para poder conocer la situación de vida de cada una y conforme a su esfuerzo poder ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
Una de ellas es la señora Mavel con quien se realizó la capacitación de presupuesto familiar ya que necesita de un control de los ingresos familiares para poder tener una mejor administración. Ella vende frutas, y tiene todo tipo de frutas frescas que ofrece a sus clientes, por medio de sus ventas ayuda a su familia y lucha para poder darles todo para una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de frutas frescas para la venta, como ser naranjas, manzanas, peras, melones, bananas y demás, de manera a poder seguir dando a sus clientes todo lo que piden en productos frescos.
texts.en:
The group named “San Juan Bosco” is in its eighth loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. All of the members are committed to work and help one another move forward. They have taken the poverty elimination survey so that they can understand their living situations and put in the effort to improve them.

One of the members is Sra. Mavel. She is taking a training seminar on household budgeting so that she can do a better job of managing her family’s expenses and keeping them under control. Mavel sells all types of fresh fruit to her customers. Through her sales, she is able help her family and provide them everything they need to have a decent life without deprivation.

Mavel is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of fresh fruits to sell such as oranges, apples, pears, melons, bananas, and other produce. As a result, she can continue to offer all of the fresh products that her customers are requesting.

loans.use: to buy oranges, apples, pears, melons, bananas, and other produce to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase various products.

loans.name: Derlis

texts.es:
Derlis es un joven que está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería en informática,  comenta que su meta es terminar su carrera, conseguir un trabajo digno para así poder mejorar la situación económica de su familia  y a la vez seguir progresando cada día.
Es una persona muy luchadora que quiere crecer por ser un buen profesional. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y con ello poder cumplir su meta de ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en:
Derlis is a young man who is studying for a degree in Information Systems Engineering. He says that his goal is to finish his degree and secure a decent job so that he can improve his family’s financial situation and continue to make progress each day.

Derlis is a determined individual who wants to grow and become a successful professional. He is requesting this loan so that he can pay his degree fees. As a result, he can accomplish his goal of making something out of his life.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer soltera de 32 años de edad, ella vive sola depende única y exclusivamente de su negocio, ella cría aves, cerdos, los alimentos y los engorda, también vende algunos huevos, todo lo que le genere recursos para llevar un alimento a su mesa.
AL ser una persona residente de una zona rural las personas dispuestas a prestarle dinero le cobran interés altísimos casi imposibles de pagar y es una de las razones por las cuales su negocio no progresa y no se mueve de lo mismo, con la ayuda de interactuar quien le ofrece una tasa de interés más bajas, y al ser una entidad legal sin ánimo de lucro la apoyara.
Ana solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, aves y alimento para ellos.
texts.en:
Ana is a single young woman who is 32 years of age. She lives alone, so she is the only one who is exclusively dependent on her business. Ana raises poultry and pigs. She is responsible for feeding and fattening them. In addition, she sells a few eggs. Everything she does is to generate income for putting food on her table.

Like other people who live in the country, she is willing to borrow money at such as high interest rate that it makes it impossible to pay back. This is one of the reasons why her business is not progressing and experiencing any movement. Interactuar will be able to help her by offering a much lower interest rate since it is a legal non-profit entity that is assisting her.

Ana is requesting a loan in order to buy chickens, poultry, and feed for these animals.

loans.use: to buy pigs, poultry, and animal feed.

loans.name: Fredis De Jesus

texts.es:
Fredis, de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está acompañado y su pareja trabaja en una venta de tortillas y tienen 1 hijo.

Fredis, abandono la escuela porque creció solo con su mamá y por la falta de recursos económicos, inicio a trabajar con sus tíos en la siembra de cultivo de maíz, a la edad de 12 años.- Además, ha trabajado durante 6 años como ayudante de albañilería, actualmente siembra un área de 7,000 metros cuadrados de cultivo de maíz. Camina 2 kilómetros hasta llegar al lugar donde siembra,  siempre recibe ayuda de dos tíos.

El préstamo será invertido para comprar insumos agrícolas y de esta forma realizar la siembra de cultivo de maíz.

El sueño de Fredis, es tener un terreno propio donde pueda realizar la siembra.- Además, le gustaría criar ganado bovino.
texts.en:
Fredis is 24 years old and studied through the third grade. He is in a relationship and his partner works by selling tortillas. They have one child.

Fredis abandoned his schoolwork because he grew up alone with his mother, who was lacking in financial resources. He started working with his uncles by planting corn at the age of 12. In addition, he worked as a masonry assistant for six years. Fredis is currently planting corn on 7,000 square meters of land. He must walk two kilometers in order to reach the place where he is planting. His two uncles are always helping him.

His loan will be invested in the purchase of farming supplies for planting corn. Fredis says his dream is to have his own land that he can cultivate. In addition, he would like to raise cattle.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for his corn crop.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase vegetables to make sauces.

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado El progreso  se formó en la ciudad de Itá, donde cada una de las integrantes quieren mejorar sus vidas por medio de su esfuerzo y sacrificio, y a través de la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza.
Cada una hace su mayor sacrificio para poder mejorar y salir adelante, donde se destaca la Sra. Nilsa, quien tiene una peluquería, que poco a poco y con sacrificio ha montado. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, que está trabajando para poder dar  a sus seres queridos todo lo que no pudo tener.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para su peluquería, como ser tintes, cremas, shampoo, enjuagues, y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo, y dando a sus clientes la buena atención que siempre buscan. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo e invirtiendo en su pequeño negocio.
texts.en:
The group named “El Progresso” was formed in the city of Itá. All of the members want to improve their lives through effort and sacrifice. They have taken the poverty elimination survey.

Each member has made a great sacrifice in order to improve and move forward. One such woman is Sra. Nilsa, who owns a beauty salon. With sacrifice, she was able to establish her business over time. She is a hardworking and determined woman who wants to provide her loved ones with everything that she wasn’t able to have.

Nilsa is requesting a loan in order to buy supplies for her beauty salon such as dyes, crèmes, shampoo, rinses, and other products so that she can continue her work and provide her clients with the good service that they always seek. She is grateful for the opportunity she has received so that she can keep growing and investing in her small business.

loans.use: to buy dyes, crèmes, shampoo, rinses, and other products used in her salon.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase various products.

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
Mirian es de la ciudad de Encarnación, está estudiando la carrera de psicología, comenta que por medio de sus estudios quiere poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Ella es una persona muy luchadora y trabajadora, que quiere salir adelante para poder ser un buen profesional exitoso.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar su cuota de la carrera, de manera poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Mirian is from the city of Encarnación. She is studying for a degree in Psychology. Mirian says that through her studies she wants to help her family and loved ones.

She is a determined and hardworking individual who wants to move forward so that she can become a successful professional. Mirian is requesting this loan in order to pay her degree fees. This will allow her to continue her studies just as before.

loans.use: to pay her degree fees.

loans.name: Nzokira Group

texts.fr:
Jean   fait partie du groupe  Nzokira et  habite à  Gitega. Il a 57 ans et est marié à Marthe ,une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 6 enfants âgés de 6 à 13 ans, dont  4 étudient.
Il a sous sa charge 2 enfants orphelins. 

Il fait le commerce du haricot, du riz, du savon,...dans sa boutique  depuis  6 ans. 

Il est à son cinquième   crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité   de haricot, de riz, et de savons  à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il voudrait  augmenter son capital, et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Jean is a member of the Nzokira Group and lives in Gitega.  He is 57 years old and married to Marthe, a farmer.  Together they have six children between the ages of six and thirteen.  Four of their children currently attend school.  They are also looking after two orphaned children.

Jean has been selling beans, rice, soap, etc from his shop for six years.  This will be his fifth loan with the field partner, Turame.  He plans to use it to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of beans, rice and soap for resale to improve his earnings.

In the coming years, Jean would like to improve his business capital and see his children study.

loans.use: to increase his working capital and buy a large quantity of beans, rice and soap for resale.

loans.name: Dembe Group

texts.fr: Le Mr qui tient la corde de bœuf  en main sur la photo est Aba.  Aba est un homme âgé de 42ans, cultivateur et emboucheur, marié,  père de 6 enfants dont 3 garçons, 02 sont scolarisés. Sa femme est ménagère et elle fait de petit commerce dans leur village. Aba est scolarisé niveau  3 année,  après il a abandonné l’école. Ces rêves et les espoirs sont : préparé l’avenir de ces enfants et lutter contre la pauvreté dans sa famille. Il achète des animaux, les matériels agricoles. Aba exerce l’embouche depuis 7ans dans leur village, il achète ces bœufs au marché de la frontière du pays avec un autre pays  et revend dans le marché local. Sur un bœuf durant 5 mois il peut avoir 150 000fcfa après toutes les dépenses comme bénéfice. Il souhaite de ne pas avoir des obstacles. Le profit lui permet de s’occuper des charges de sa famille.
texts.en:
The gentleman who is holding the bull on a rope, is Aba.  He is 42 years old, married and father to six children, of whom three are boys and two attend school.  He is a farmer who also raises livestock.  Aba's wife is a housewife and also sells various products in their village.

Aba attended school up to the third year but then abandoned his studies.  His hopes and dreams are to provide for the future of his children and defeat the poverty of his family.  He buys and sells animals and agricultural materials and has been raising livestock in his village for seven years.  He buys his beef cattle from a border-town market and then sells them at the local market.  After fattening up a bull for five months, he will make a clear profit of 150,000 francs CFA.

Aba would like to overcome the obstacles in his life and provide for the expenses of his family.

loans.use: to buy beef cattle for fattening up.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a 54-year-old, married woman with five children, one of whom is still in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Erlinda has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like bananas, cooking oil, sugar, etc. for her business. She has been in this business for 31 years.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Erlinda would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like bananas, cooking oil, sugar, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start a business selling women's clothes

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
This is 42-year-old Fatmata. She is married and has 2 children aged 13 and 21 years old. 

In 2001, Fatmata established her food products business. She began her business because she did not attend school. Her business is located in a centre market and her main customers are both men and women. Working 7 days a week and 7 hours a day, she earns about 1,000,000 SLL every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL in order to buy more of her food products for resale. She hopes that this loan will support her in increasing the level of her additional income. 

In the future, Fatmata plans to build a shop for more business expansion. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more food products for resale.

loans.name: Duguyiriwa Group

texts.fr:
Fatoumata est la femme qui a la corne du bélier en main sur la photo.
Fatoumata est une femme de 35 ans, mariée, mère de 7enfants dont 1 est scolarisé. Son mari cultive pour nourrir son foyer. Les rêves et les espoirs de Fatoumata sont : acheter des matériels  de culture, les habits, les ustensiles de mariage etc... Elle habite dans une commune rurale au Mali. Fatoumata a été scolarisée, arrêta en 4 années. Elle fait l’embouche pour améliorer sa vie, ces enfants lui aident beaucoup à nourrir les animaux. Elle achète ses moutons au marché local et revend dans le même marché. Cette activité lui rend beaucoup d’intérêt, car elle a eu des brebis et des frais scolaires des enfants. Elle exerce cette activité depuis 3 ans. Elle emprunte avec RMCR pour acheter plus de moutons pour embouche puis les revend. Elle pourrait gagner   20 000f comme bénéfice après la vente . Elle n’ a pas rencontre d’obstacle pour le moment.
texts.en:
Fatoumata is the woman holding the ram by the horn in the photo.  She is 35 years old, married and mother to seven children, of whom one attends school.  Her husband works in agriculture to support their family.

The hopes and dreams of Fatoumata are to buy agricultural materials, clothing and household equipment.  She lives in a rural commune in Mali.  Fatoumata attended school until the fourth year.  She now raises animals for a living, and is helped in this by her children.  She buys her sheep at the local market and then sells them on at the same market.  This business is profitable and has allowed her to buy more sheep and pay for her children's school fees.  Fatoumata has been working in this business for three years.  

Fatoumata works with the field partner, RMCR, to buy her animals.  She earns 20,000francs CFA profit on the sale of an animal.  So far, she has not encountered any obstacles in her business.

loans.use: to buy sheep for fattening up and resale.

loans.name: Manuel Enrique

texts.es:
Manuel es un joven de 24 años de edad que como puede logra generar el sustento para su familia conformada por tres hijos dos niñas de 10 y 5 años  y un pequeño de 2 años, como tuvo hijos tan joven le toco salir a buscar trabajo, dejando sus estudios de lado solo por no dejar que pasaran hambre, como pueden ver su hogar es muy humilde pero poco a poco va logrando ganar cosas nuevas.
Manuel en el momento se encuentra desempleado pero no darse ese lujo ya que es el único sustento para su hogar, con la ayuda de un crédito quiere iniciar su vida como independiente, vendiendo bebidas como refrescos y cervezas que esperar con ella aumentar la calidad de vida de su familia, que sus hijos estudien y realizar reparaciones a su hogar.
texts.en:
Manuel, 24, does what he can to support his family which consists of his three children: two girls ages 10 and 5, and a little boy, age 2.  Since he had children when he was very young he had to get a job and was unable to finish his education in order to put food on the table.  As you can see, his home is a humble one, but little by little he is achieving new things.

Manuel is currently unemployed but cannot let the situation persist as he is the only breadwinner at home.  With the help of the loan he will begin an independent business, selling soft drinks and beers.  He hopes to improve his family's quality of life, enable his children to get an education and carry out repairs at home.

loans.use: To start a soft drinks and beer business to stay employed.

loans.name: Yenny Lorena

texts.es: Yeni es una joven de 20 años de edad que tiene como única prioridad estudiar para ser alguien en la vida, proviene de una familia humilde que no le puede pagar estudios, por eso quiere lanzarse al mundo del emprendimiento y del comercio iniciando un negocio del cual necesita un apoyo tuyo para comprar surtido de ropa que venderá a familiares y amigos con los ingresos pagara estudios, pagare transporte, libros y se soportara todo lo de la universidad por eso apóyala ella quiere ser autosuficiente.
texts.en: Yeni is 20 years old and her only priority is to get an education and become someone in life.  She is from a humble family who cannot affort to pay for her studies.  Therefore she wants to become an entrepreneur in commerce and start a business, for which she needs your help.  She wants to buy a variety of clothing to sell to family and friends and use the income to pay for her studies, transport, books and everything related to the university.  Please help her become self-sufficient.

loans.use: To start her own clothing business to support her education.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia es de la ciudad de Villarrica, es una señora muy trabajadora y emprendedora que se esfuerza para poder ser alguien en la vida y poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Ella esta estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Agroindustrial, con lo que quiere poder ayudar a la sociedad por medio de sus conocimientos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Alicia is from Villarrica. She is a very hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who makes a big effort to make herself someone in life and be able to help her loved ones. 

She is studying a degree in Agro-Industrial Engineering because she wants to use her knowledge to help society.

She is requesting the loan so she can pay her degree fees and continue studying.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Roland Geiber

texts.es:
Roland es un hombre soltero de 31 años de edad, dedicado cuerpo y alma al campo, siempre fue trabajador, ejerciendo cargos muy pesados por un bajo sueldo, pero un amigo el hizo cambiar su forma de ver las cosas y lo animo para que emprendedor.
Roland vive en una zona donde cultivan mucha caña de azúcar y el medio que usan para transportarlo son personas y mulas.
Roland quiere de su mano iniciar su propio negocio de transporte de caña, comprara dos mulas ofertando sus servicios a sus vecinos.
Apoya a este hombre que se cansó del trabajo pesado pro un bajo jornal, y que busca iniciar su negocio demostrando que las personas del campo también son muy inteligentes.
texts.en:
Roland, 31, is single and dedicates himself, in body and soul, to farming.  He has always been a hard worker, taking on very heavy jobs for a small wage.  But a friend made him change his way of thinking and encouraged him to become an entrepreneur.

Roland lives in an area where a great amount of sugarcane is grown.  It is transported by people and mules.  Roland wants to start his own sugarcane transport business, buying two mules to offer services to his neighbors.

Please support this man who is tired of working hard for little pay.  He wants to start his own business and demonstrate that farmers are also intelligent.

loans.use: To buy two mules and start his own sugarcane transport business.

loans.name: Mirzosuhayl

texts.ru: Мирзосухайл мужчина 35 лет, женат, отец четверых детей. Вот уже на протяжение 10 лет он занимается животноводством. На своем участке земли Мирзосухайл разводит крупный рогатый скот – коров и баранов. Из молока, полученного от дойки коров, его жена изготавливает сметану и продает на рынке. Выручка хватает на некоторые мелкие покупки. Мирзосухайл работает усердно, потому что хочет обеспечить свою семью и иметь возможность дать образование своим детям. Мирзосухайл планирует расширить свой бизнес и купить еще одну корову и корм для скота. Но у него нет полной суммы денег. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за получением кредита. Заранее благодарит за содействие и поддержку.
texts.en: Mirzosuhayl is a 35-year-old man who is married with four children.  For 10 years he has been raising livestock.  Mirzosuhayl raises cattle on his own plot of land - cows and lamb.  His wife makes sour cream with the milk from their dairy cows and sells it at the market.  Their revenue only allows for a few small purchases.  Mirzosuhayl works hard because he wants to take care of his family and to have the chance to give his children an education.  He is planning on expanding his business and buying another cow and feed for his animals, but he doesn't have enough money.  This is why he has turned to MDO Arvand for a loan.  He is grateful in advance for the promotion and support.

loans.use: to increase his head of livestock

loans.name: Zulma

texts.es:
Zulma es de la ciudad de Pilar, está estudiando la carrera de derecho, con su esfuerzo y lucha diaria trata de poder sobresalir en sus estudios para ser una buena profesional el día de mañana.
Comenta que su meta es poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres querido, ya que ellos siempre han sido su sostén.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Zulma is from the city of Pilar and studying law. With hard work every day, she is trying to do well in her studies so that she will be a good lawyer in the future.

Zulma says that her goal is to be able to help her family and loved ones, as they have always supported her.

Zulma is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees and continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Rajabmo

texts.ru: Рачабмо добрая и отзывчивая женщина из района Чилинкул. Ей 52 года. У нее двое детей. Дочка замужем, а сын находится за приделами страны на заработках. Рачабмо работает в забегаловке и в свободное от работы время дома занимается шитьем женской одежды. Ей нравиться проводить время за швейной машинкой, она получает удовольствия от процесса работы. Рачабмо хочет сменить свою машинку на более новую, и так как машинка стоить дорого Рачабмо обратилась за кредитом. Она надеется, что ей не откажут в кредите, и она купит швейную машинку, будет принимать заказы на шитье одежды, соберет достаточно средств, чтобы помочь сыну сыграть свадьбу, когда он приедет из Российской Федерации. Рачабмо заранее благодарит Вас за помощь.
texts.en: Rajabmo is a kind and empathetic woman from Jilikul.  She is 52 years old and she has two children.  Her daughter is married and her son is working abroad.  Rajabmo works outside the home and in her spare time she works sewing women's clothes at home.  She enjoys spending time at the sewing machine and she gets pleasure from the process of her work.  Rajabmo wants to replace her sewing machine with a newer one, but it is expensive, which is why she has asked for a loan.  She hopes that she will receive the loan so she can buy the sewing machine and take orders to sew clothes.  She could save up enough money to help put on her son's wedding when he returns from the Russian Federation.  Rajabmo thanks you in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Fatima

texts.es:
Fatima con mucho esfuerzo está pudiendo trabajar  y a la vez estudiar, sus padres le brindan su apoyo en todo lo que ella busca emprender y capacitarse.
Su meta es poder culminar su carrera y obtener su titulo de manera a mejorar su vida y poder ayudar a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
With a lot of hard work, Fatima is able both to work and study at the same time. Her parents support her with everything that wants to try and to learn.

Fatima’s goal is to finish her studies and graduate. By doing so, she can improve her life and she will be able to help her family.

Fatima is applying for a loan in order to pay university fees and to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Farides

texts.es: Inmenso es el sueño de Farides, en ayudar a su hijo para que sea un profesional exitoso; este proposito es el motor por el que todos los dias, de lunes a domingo y desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, se adhiere a su máquina de coser y produce con esmero para generar ingresos y lograrlo. Las operaciones de la confección, las aprendió Farides de su madre y fue un gran legado, que hoy la conduce a ofrecer las prendas elaboradas a todo costo y a ofrecer el servicio a la medida del cliente, cuando este lleva a su taller materias primas e inusmos y muchas veces su propio diseño, para que Faride elabore el producto. Faride vende a crédito y compra de contado a mayoristas especializados en confecciones, quienes le ofrecen precios competitivos, con los que conquista a su clientela. Ella necesita aumentar su productividad y por eso está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financimeinto que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con el cual comprará telas, encajes, botones y mas insumos, para elaborar ropa a todo costo y venderla. Su mayor desafio es abrir un local comercial en un futuro, desarrollando un punto de comercialización donde venda productos elaborado con sus propias manos.
texts.en:
Farides has a big dream, which is helping her son to become a successful professional. This goal motivates her to work with her sewing machine Monday through Sunday, from 8am to 8pm, and to generate income. Farides learned to sew from her mother, which is a very valuable legacy. She offers different types of clothes and also personalized services to clients who bring their own materials and sometimes their design. Farides sells on credit and buys in cash to wholesale retailers specialized in clothing who offer competitive prices very appreciated by her clients. 

She needs to increase productivity, which is why she is asking for a credikiva, her first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She plans to buy fabric, laces, buttons and others to make various pieces of clothing and sell them. Her biggest challenge is to open a store in the future and to develop a trading point to sell her handmade products.

loans.use: to buy fabric, laces, buttons and others.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor es un joven de 22 años, nacido y criado en las zonas rurales de Antioquia, él es propietario de uno de los sitios de recreación nocturna de chigorodo, Víctor atienda una discoteca donde ofrece empleo a una persona.
El principal factor que detiene el progreso de Víctor son los paga diarios, para las personas que no están familiarizadas con este término son personas que prestan dinero a interés altísimo y como en esa zona no había una entidad solo podían recurrir a estos.
Gracias a la inclusión de interactuar en estas zonas personas como Víctor pueden solicitar su préstamo con entidades de confianzas y legales.
Víctor solicita un préstamo para la compra de licores, cervezas, aguardiente y ron que son las bebidas más consumidas. 
Su gran sueño es poder comprar una casa propia y un automóvil.
texts.en:
Victor, 22, is a young man who was born and raised in a rural area of Antioquia.  He owns one of the nighttime entertainment sites in Chigorodo.  He runs a discoteque and offers employment to people.

The main obstacles in Victor's progress are the "pagadiarios" (loan sharks) that collect daily.  For people who are unfamiliar with this term, it means people who lend money at a very high interest rate and collect daily.  Since there are no other lending entities in the area, they are the only recourse.

Thanks to Interactuar's activity in these areas, people like Victor can get a loan from trusted, legal entities.

The loan he is requesting is to buy liquors and beers, which are the most popular beverages.  His goal is to buy his own house and a car.

loans.use: To buy liquors and beer.

loans.name: Julianys

texts.es: Cubrelechos, sabanas, utensilios de cocina, ropa femenina etc, son los articulos que comercializa Julianys desde las 8 de la mañana hasta la 6 de la tarde, diariamente, para generar ingresos importantes y apoyar el bienestar de su hogar, conformado por su cónyuge y su pequeño hijo de 3 años de edad. Julianys inició su actividad comercial hace 1 año, vendiendo a crédito a una clientela doméstica conformada por su familia principalmente,a la que poco a poco fué agregando, amistades y vecinos, además de referenciados que gradualmente han aumentado.Cuando inició su negocio, Julianys lo hizo apoyada en la experiencia de sus suegros y con el propósito de apoyar a su cónyuge en los gastos del hogar. Hoy su tarea comercial no se detiene y vende de lunes a domingos a crédito y compra en el centro de la ciudad, donde encuentre los mejores precios que le permitan ser competitiva. Su meta mas adelante es tener una infraestructiura física que incluya vitrinas y finalmente cumplir su gran sueño es tener casa propia que de aun mas bienstar a su familia. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer finaciamiento que hace la Fundación mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará utensilios de cocina, sabanas, cubrelechos, con esta inversión tendrá un surtido que impactará la necesidad, el deseo y la acción de compra de sus clientela y esto es justamente lo que hace que su credikiva sea una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
From 8am until 6pm every day, Julianys goes out to sell bedspreads, bed sheets, kitchen utensils, women’s clothing and other items in order to earn the necessary income to support her household. Julianys lives with her partner and three-year-old son.

Julianys started this business one year ago by selling to customers – mainly family members – on credit. Gradually, she moved on to sell to friends and neighbours, and others came to her through word of mouth.

Julianys had the support of her parents-in-law when she started her business, which she did in order to support her partner with household costs. Now, her business just keeps getting bigger. Buying her products in the city centre, where she can find the best prices that allow her to be competitive. Julianys sells her goods on credit seven days a week.

Julianys’ goal is to have a shop with display cases and to achieve her big goal of owning a house in order to look after her family.

Julianys is applying for a Kiva loan, her first through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use this loan to buy kitchen utensils, bed sheets and bedspreads. 

This loan will give Julianys the stock that her customers need and want to buy. This will make Julianys’ loan a successful investment.

loans.use: to buy kitchen utensils, bed sheets and bedspreads.

loans.name: Yenifer

texts.es: Cuando en el año 2013, la madre de Yenifer, (mujer comerciante y con mucha experiencia), le sugirió iniciar su propio negocio, ella no lo dudó y  extendió la actividad de su madre, vendiendo ropa, calzado, perfumeria, cremas y cosméticos. Inició con pocos clientes, pero gradualmente ha impulsado sus ventas, trabajando con mucho esmero, desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche y su clientela ha crecido; hoy su meta es continuar auemntando sus compradores  y mas adelante abrir un punto de atención al público, porque finalmente sueña con remodelar la casa de sus padres, aunque su mayor desafio es lograr la fidelización de su clientela. Yenifer vende mercancia mediante guias especializadas de productos o catalogos, y tiene muchos encargos, por eso está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará ropa, calzado, perfumería, cremas y  cosméticos, para satisfacer las necesidades de su clientela y lograr incrementar sus ventas y con ello sus utilidades, haciendo de su creikiva una inversión exitosa.
texts.en:
In 2013, when Yenifer’s mother (an experienced businesswomen) suggested that she start her own business, Yenifer had no doubts and began doing the same work as her mother. Yenifer sells clothes, footwear, perfumes, lotions and other cosmetics. She began with very few customers but has gradually increased sales and her customer base, working very hard from 8am until 8pm. 

Today, Yenifer’s goal is to continue increase her number of customers and, in the future, have premises for her business. She also dreams of remodelling her parents’ house but her biggest dream is to have customer loyalty.

Yenifer sells merchandise through specialist catalogues. She has many orders and so is applying for a Kiva loan, her first through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. Yenifer will use this loan to buy clothes, footwear, perfumes, lotions, and other cosmetics in order to satisfy the needs of her customers. She can thus increase sales and profits, making her Kiva loan a successful investment.

loans.use: to buy clothes, footwear, perfumes, lotions, and other cosmetics.

loans.name: Sabohat

texts.ru: Сабохат 26 лет. Она жительница города под названием Курган-Тюбе. Она пока еще не замужем. Она живет вместе родителей. Сабохат серьезная и шустрая девушка.  Его отец занимается животноводством. Мама домохозяйка, ведет домашние хозяйство. Сабохат 3 года назад научилась кроить и сшить женскую одежду. Она сейчас зарабатывает и помогает родителям обеспечить семью. Она берет шитье на заказ, и занимается дома. Сабохат обратилась за кредитом, чтобы расширить деятельность. Она за счет кредита купить ткани и другие принадлежности. Это кредит поможет ей продвигаться дальше.
texts.en: Sabohat is 26 years old.  She is a resident of a city called Qurgan-Tube.  She is not yet married and she lives with her parents.  Sabohat is a serious and hard-working young woman.  Her father raises livestock for a living and her mother is a homemaker who runs their farm.  Three years ago, Sabohat began to cut out and sew women's clothing.  She now earns money at this and she helps her parents feed the family.  She takes sewing orders and fulfills them at home.  Sabohat has asked for a loan to expand her business.  She plans to use the loan to buy fabric and other materials.  This loan will help her move forward.

loans.use: to buy fabric and other materials to expand her business

loans.name: Maria Besnaida

texts.es:
María una mujer de 32 años de edad que carga en sus hombros una enorme responsabilidad ella es madre cabeza de familia de 4 hijos de 15, 13, 11 y 9 años de edad, depende única y exclusivamente de ella, es separada de su esposo, en el momento se encuentra desempleada y algo desesperada.
María quiere acudir ante ustedes para que apoyen su proyecto, quiere iniciar como emprendedora en el mundo del comercio y prestación de servicios, desea abrir una tienda de abarrotes, por eso con el préstamo que está pidiendo lo invertirá de la siguiente forma:
•	Materiales de construcción del negocio que ubicara en la sala de la casa
•	Mano de obra
•	Armarios, estanterías en madera, 
•	Surtido de víveres y abarrotes para iniciar
texts.en:
Maria, 32, has an enormous responsibility on her shoulders as she is the head of household and mother of four children, ages 15, 13, 11 and 9 who depend exclusively on her, since she is divorced from her husband.  Currently she is unemployed and a bit desperate.

Maria is coming to you for support of her project.  She wants to become an entrepreneur in the world of commerce and services by opening a grocery store.  She plans to invest the loan she is requesting as follows:

- Construction materials for the store she will open in a room of the house
- Labor costs
- Wooden cupboards and shelving 
- Stock of groceries to start business

loans.use: To build a store space, hire workers, buy shelving and groceries.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en:
Gregorio makes a living by raising pigs. The 62-year-old father of six children, now all grown up, has been in the business for more than several years.

Gregorio would like to take a loan to buy animal feed, and more piglets to raise. A loan will help him improve his hog raising business, and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy animal feed, and more piglets to raise

loans.name: Evenecer Group

texts.es:
El grupo "Evenecer" está integrado por 9 personas que se conocen desde hace varios años, la comunidad que habitan se caracteriza por tener mucha vegetación y la mayoría de las personas son comerciantes aunque todos salen a vender a otras ciudades incluso durante varias semanas. 

El nombre del grupo significa "Dios esta aquí" Doña Angeles, es una persona muy trabajadora a pesar de su edad, aún tiene grandes aspiraciones en la vida. Ella tiene 56 años de edad y está casada con el señor Julio con quien formó una familia con nueve hijos  que actualmente ya son independientes.

Hace 35 años, Ángela (como mejor la conocen en la comunidad) comenzó a vender productos de limpieza, actividad que le ayudó a solventar sus gastos y sacar adelante a su familia. Con sus ganancias y los préstamos de VisionFund México ahora  le es posible iniciar un segundo negocio: cría y venta de borregos, es por ello que necesita invertir su préstamo en borregos. Esta no es una actividad desconocida para Ángela, algún tiempo atrás también destinaba tiempo para criar y vender borregos. Su idea es que este sea su negocio principal nuevamente para no salir más de su comunidad; aunque ya no tiene hijos que dependan de ella, sí quiere seguir contribuyendo con los gastos de su hogar. 

Ángela está muy agradecida con VisionFund México porque gracias a los préstamos ha sido posible tener sus dos actividades. Ahora su único sueño es poder seguir creciendo, tener sus borregos y estar bien de salud.

Los demás integrantes del grupo son Amelia quien invertirá en productos de lipieza; Yanett, Azucena, Maria Felisa y Alicia, en plásticos, Albino, en colchas y almohadas, Maricela y Josefina invertirán en bonetería. 

*La fotografia fue tomada en las escaleras debajo del quiosco del municipio, Ángela es quien lleva un rebozo verde*
texts.en:
The group “Evenecer” is comprised of nine members. They have known each other for some years. They live in a community surrounded by abundant vegetation. Most locals work in commerce and visit other cities to sell their products. Sometimes they are away for weeks.

The word “Evenecer” means “God is here.” Angeles is a hardworking woman. Despite her age, she has great aspirations. She is 56 years old and married to Julio. They had nine children together, who are now independent. 35 years ago, Ángela (which is how locals call her) started to sell cleaning products. This activity helped her to better cover her expenses and get ahead with her family.

With the profits she makes, and the loans from VisionFund México, she will start a second business. She will raise and sell sheep, and this is why she is requesting a loan to buy some. This is not a new activity for Ángela, since she used to do it some time ago. Her goal is to make this business her main source of income so that she does not have to leave her community anymore. Although her children are independent now, she would like to continue to help with the home expenses.

Ángela appreciates the loans she has received from VisionFund México. Thanks to them, she has been able to have her two businesses. Her only dream now is to continue growing, raise some sheep, and keep her good health.

The remaining members are Amelia, who will buy cleaning products; Yanett, Azucena, Maria Felicia and Alicia, who will buy plastic products; Albino, who will buy blankets and pillows; and Maricela and Josefina, who will buy notions.

* The picture was taken in the stairs that lead to the municipality’s bandstand. Ángela is wearing a green shawl. *

loans.use: to buy lambs.

location.town: San Agustin Mextepec, San Felipe del progreso

loans.name: Dúo La Comunidad Group

texts.es:
Dúo la comunidad
Esta integrado por la señora Yuri quien es madre de 4 niños de los cuales todos estudian es una mujer emprendedora la cual tiene como meta y por sueño poder sacar adelante  a sus hijos y poder contribuir en la manera posible con los gastos de la familia. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos TOPER y Cosmeticos en el cual le ha ido muy bien pues atravez de ello ha logrado hacer algunas cosas materiales de su casa y en esta ocasión solicita de ustedes como fundación la adquisición  de un crédito para la inversión en productos toper y cosmeticos esperando que le sea tomada en cuenta dicha solicitud.
texts.en: The "Duo La Comunidad" is formed by Yuri, who is the mother of 4 children, all of whom are studying. She is an enterprising woman whose goal and dream is to move her children ahead, and be able to help with household expenses. She works selling plastic containers and cosmetics, and this job has been good because she has been able to afford many things in her house. This time she is requesting a loan to you as a foundation, in order to invest it in plastic containers and cosmetics. She hopes her application is successful.

loans.use: to buy plastic container products and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores is 62 years old and married. Dolores works very hard to provide for her family.

Dolores runs a general store in the Philippines. Dolores has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as soft drinks, biscuits, snacks, candies and other groceries. 

Dolores requested a PHP 5,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, groceries, etc..

In the future, Dolores would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta is a married woman with one child. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Loreta is 49 years old and has one child in school.

Loreta has a food vending business in the Philippines. Loreta requested a PHP 6000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Loreta has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Loreta would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Rengchonghoi Group

texts.en:
“Life is good when business runs smoothly according to your plan,” says Boungcham, the profiled borrower of the group Rengchonghoi. Boungcham is the lady pictured with her hand raised. She has two daughters and a baby boy 9 months old. They live in Longa K village situated at the northeastern part of India. They belong to one of the minority tribal groups of Manipur. The village she and her family dwell in lacks opportunities for employment. 

Her husband is engaged in cultivation of seasonal vegetables like corn, ginger, turmeric and other leafy vegetables. He supports his family from the income he gets by selling his produce. Boungcham engages in a charcoal business that is very profitable for income generation, especially during winter season. She provides educational expenses for her children and family expenses from her charcoal business income.
 
She applied for a WSDS loan to start running her business in full swing once again. The Kiva loan will be used to buy at least 30 sacks of charcoal from the villagers at low cost, which she will resell in the town market at higher rates. The profit she makes will provide for her baby and the educational cost of her two daughters. 

She is very excited to get loan and consider that she will be able to stand on her own feet again since her last pregnancy. She hopes for successful business. The rest of the group members are engaged in poultry, piggery, grocery store and fishery businesses. The Kiva loan will be use to improve their business endeavours. They are all very excited and send their thanks to the lenders.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to resell for profit to provide for her family’s expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to open a grocery shop.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella, 34, is a married woman with five children, four of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Estrella has a cellular phone shop business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years.

Estrella requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials, tools and accessories for her business. 

In the future, Estrella would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials, tools and accessories for her business.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina, 45, is a married woman with three children who are all in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Gina has a broom-making business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years.

Gina requested a PHP 7,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy materials like bamboo sticks, etc.

In the future, Gina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy materials like bamboo sticks, etc.

loans.name: Flordeliza

texts.en:
Flordeliza, 47, is a married woman with four children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Flordeliza has a food-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years. 

Flordeliza requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

In the future, Flordeliza would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is 36 years old and married with six children. With one child currently in school, Janet works very hard to provide for them.

Janet runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years and sells a variety of items such as toothpaste, canned goods, detergent soap, shampoo, fabric conditioners, cereals, etc.  

Janet requested a PHP 18,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

Janet would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en: Shahnaz has successfully built her business of carpet manufacturing with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. Currently she has attained a good number of customers and makes a good amount of income to contribute to the family's income. Previously with the help of Kiva she was able to expand her business. Now she is in her 5th loan cycle and has applied a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase more sacks of wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibers, etc. This will enable her to increase her sales to more areas and to gain more profits.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibers, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her rice business

loans.name: Jeramie

texts.en:
Jeramie works hard to support her family. Jeramie is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Jeramie requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

Jeramie has been in this business for 2 years now.

Jeramie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her business by buying stock in bulk to increase profits.

loans.name: Hurida

texts.en:
Hurida is an ambitious 21 year old who works as a saleswoman and volunteers as a teacher. 

As a Camfed Learner Guide, she volunteers to teach life skills to students in her nearby ward secondary school. Through her lessons, Hurida encourages students to find their own strengths and to think about how to create a better world. 

On top of this, she runs a door-to-door business selling used clothes around her village. 

Hurida is now requesting a Kiva loan in order to rent a store frame where she can settle with her business. The profit obtained will help her to increase the number of products she could sell in this store. The interest on Hurida’s loan will be repaid through her weekly two and a half hours of volunteering, which are so valuable for Camfed’s younger students.

loans.use: to rent a store-frame where she can settle with her business.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a 23-year-old business woman, mother and volunteer teacher. Agnes supports two dependents, her mother and her child, with their basic needs. She does this by selling powder soap by walking from door to door, as she does’t yet have a shop. On top of this, Agnes volunteers in her community, working with secondary students in a life-skills program which helps them to boost their learning performance. Her lessons focus on effective communication and on building her students’ confidence.

Agnes is now requesting a Kiva loan to develop her business further, in order to make greater profits. The interest on this loan will be repaid through Agnes’ weekly two and a half hours of volunteering, which are so valuable for Camfed’s younger students.

loans.use: to develop her powder soap business further.

loans.name: Asia

texts.en: Asia is a determined 22-year-old, running a snack business and volunteering as a teacher. As a volunteer Camfed Learner Guide, she teaches life skills to students in her local secondary school, including lessons on effective communication and personal confidence. For business, Asia sells charcoal. She respects everyone in her community and is hard working. She uses part of her profit to support her own basic needs, and invests the rest in expanding her business. Asia is now requesting a Kiva loan to develop her charcoal business further. With the increased profits from this, she intends to more fully cover her family’s daily expenses.

loans.use: to develop her charcoal business further

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis  joven ecuatoriano de 25 años de edad, oriundo de la ciudad de Latacunga , perteneciente a la provincia de  Cotopaxi, vive en casa arrendada  desde hace varios años, es soltero, con el sacrificio de sus padres pudo terminar sus estudios primarios, Luis  es un muchacho muy emprendedor y trabajador él es un gran apoyo económico y moral para su familia, desde muy niño ha trabajado junto a sus padres en la crianza de animales menores y ganado vacuno, hoy en día Misael tiene su propia microempresa, la misma que se trata de la crianza y venta de cerdos de raza.  Para Luis  no ha sido nada fácil superarse sin embargo él es un hombre emprendedor que no le ha importado ningún obstáculo desde muy pequeño aprendió a trabajar  debido a que por falta de recursos económicos no pudo seguir estudiando.
A Luis  le gusta mucho hacer deporte ya que esto le ayuda a mantenerse sano, hoy en día está solicitando un crédito el mismo que será utilizado para la compra de mas cerdos y una reproductora esto ayudará a incrementar sus gananacias debido a que sus ventas en los últimos meses han crecido, de esta manera crecerá la utilidad y por ende tendrán un mejor estilo de vida, es por esto que Luis agradece a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida familiar y personal.
texts.en:
Luis is a young 25 year old Ecuadorian, a native from the city of Latacunga, belonging to the province of Cotopaxi. He has lived in a rented house for several years and is single. With the sacrifice of his parents, he could finish his primary studies. Luis is an enterprising and hardworking young man. He is a great economic and moral support for his family. 

Ever since he was a small boy, he worked together with his parents raising small animals and cattle. Today he has his own micro-enterprise raising and selling pigs. For Luis, it has not been easy to overcome, nevertheless he is an entrepreneur who has not cared about obstacles. From an early age he learned to work because lack of funds would not allow for him to continue studying. Luis likes playing sports because it allows him to stay healthy.

Today he is asking for a loan to use for the purchase of more pigs for breeding in order to increase profits, because his sales in recent months have grown. In this way he can increase profitability and therefore have a better quality of life. This is why Luis thanks Fundación Alternativa in Ecuador and Kiva for making growth in his family and personal life possible.

loans.use: to purchase more pigs for breeding which will serve to increase profits and have a better quality of life.

loans.name: Sophia

texts.en: Sophia is 21 years old; she is single with one child. Sophia has four dependants: her mother, child, sister and her young sister. She has supported students since January 2014 by  offering guidance and helping them to understand themselves and to know how to cope with daily life. At her business, she sells tomatoes, onions, cooking oil, kerosene, beans and so on. She has done this business for almost one year and two months. She uses her profits to buy basic needs for herself and her dependents and to expand her business. She requesting this Kiva loan to expand her business. Her dream is to be a wholesaler.

loans.use: to expand her business

loans.name: Cesar Gustavo

texts.es:
César  hombre ecuatoriano de 35 años de edad, oriundo de la ciudad de Latacunga , perteneciente a la provincia de  Cotopaxi, vive en casa propia desde  hace varios años, actualmente está divorciado , con el sacrificio de sus padres pudo terminar sus estudios secundarios, César  es un muchacho muy emprendedor y trabajador él es un gran apoyo económico y moral para su familia y sus hijos  desde muy niño ha trabajado junto a sus padres, hoy en día se dedica a la confeccion de ropa deportiva  tiene su propia microempresa.  Para César  no ha sido nada fácil superarse sin embargo él es un hombre emprendedor que no le ha importado ningún obstáculo desde muy pequeño aprendió a trabajar  debido a que por falta de recursos económicos no pudo seguir estudiando.
A César le gusta mucho hacer deporte ya que esto le ayuda a mantenerse sano, hoy en día está solicitando un crédito el mismo que será utilizado para la compra de mas materia prima  esto ayudará a incrementar sus ganancias debido a que sus ventas en los últimos meses han crecido, de esta manera crecerá la utilidad y por ende tendrán un mejor estilo de vida, es por esto que César  agradece a Fundación Alternativa en Ecuador y a Kiva por hacer posible el crecimiento en su vida familiar y personal.
texts.en:
César is a 35 year old Ecuadorian man from Latacunga city in the Cotopaxi province.  He has lived in his own house for several years.  He is currently divorced.  He was able to complete high school with his parents’ sacrifice.  César is very enterprising and hard-working young man.  He is a great financial and moral support for his family and his children.  Ever since he was a boy he has worked together with his parents.  He now makes sportswear and has his own small business.  It has not been easy for César to improve himself.  However, he is an enterprising man to whom no obstacle has mattered.  

When he was very little he learned to work because he was not able to continue his education due to the lack of economic resources.
César likes to play sports because this helps him to stay healthy.  

He is now requesting a loan to buy raw material.  This will help him increase his earnings because his sales have grown in the past months.  This way his profits will grow and, therefore, they will have a better lifestyle.  This is why César is grateful to the Fundación Alternative in Ecuador and Kiva for making the growth of his family life and his personal life possible.

loans.use: to buy raw material.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Jessica works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Jessica is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients like meat, spices, vegetables, etc. for her food vending business.

Jessica has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so that she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Olivar

texts.en:
Olivar is a young lady who is 21 years old. She lives with her mother at Kilombero district. Olivar volunteers to teach life skills to students in her nearby secondary school. 

She runs a restaurant business where she sells tea and breakfast bites. She requests a Kiva loan to increase her kitchen equipment like hot pots, buckets and tea cups for her restaurant. She will use her profit to expand her business by renovating her frame and paying household expenses.

loans.use: to increase her kitchen equipment

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Marilyn works hard to support her family.

She has a rice farming business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming vegetables. Marilyn is borrowing 5,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies for her rice farming business.

Marilyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Juana

texts.en:
Juana is 47 years old and married with four children.  

Juana is in the agricultural business of raising livestock in the Philippines. Juana requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase vitamins and other supplies for her livestock.

Juana has been raising livestock for five years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Juana would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins and other supplies for her livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand her chips business

loans.name: Decylona

texts.en: Decylona is 39 years old and single. She lives in Misom, Baliangao, Philippines. She earns a living offering manicure/pedicure services. She has been in this business for about 15 years and is well known for the nice quality of services she offers. She has already purchased some manicure sets and was able to save from it. Her service is self-sustainable and has become profitable with a net profit of about PHP 2,000 per month. Decylona is seeking a PHP 3,000 loan. She would like to use the loan to purchase new manicure sets and cutex. In her previous, loans she has never had a delinquency. Decylona is very diligent and loves accuracy, which only adds to the effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to buy new manicure sets.

loans.name: Buenaventura

texts.en: Buenaventura is 64 years old and lives in Mitimos, Rizal. She is a widow with two children. Buenaventura has been engaged in a grocery business for 10 years already. She earns approximately PHP 7,000 each month from doing this type of work. Her family also earns support from her children. This amount is so helpful to meet their family needs. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional construction materials for the finishing of their ongoing house construction. Buenaventura has been a member of PMPC just this year. In the future, Buenaventura hopes to expand into an e-loading business.

loans.use: to buy additional material for housing renovation.

loans.name: Orfilia Floricelda

texts.es:
El cantón se llama así en honor de la Virgen del Carmen. Posee una considerable riqueza en flora y fauna, siendo una de las fuentes principales de ingreso el cultivo del plátano de la variedad Barraganete.
En este lugar vive la señora Orfilia, tiene 45 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene seis hijos mayores de edad e independientes. El cónyuge es comerciante de mariscos en el mercado municipal del Carmen, viven en casa propia.
Doña Orfilia para ayudarle a sus esposo con los gastos del hogar hace cuatro años empezó un negocio, ella tiene un pequeño comedor en el cual prepara deliciosos platos, trabaja de lunes a sábados desde las 05h00 hasta las  a las 14h00. Trabaja con la ayuda de los hijos en la venta y atención al cliente,  siempre le ha ido muy bien ya que sus clientes la prefieren por la sazón que le pone a sus platos.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pescado, conchas, camarones, etc. para el negocio del esposo. Está en el Grupo De Crédito desde hace un año y medio  y le gusta porque el grupo es unido y los créditos tiene interese bajos.
texts.en:
This canton has its name in honor of the Virgin of Carmen. It possesses a considerable richness of flora and fauna, with the cultivation of plantains of the Barraganete variety being one of the principle sources of income.

In this place lives Orfilia. She is 45 years old and maintains an open civil union from which she has six children who are adults and independent. Her husband is a shellfish merchant in the main market of Carmen. They live in their own home.

Ofilia, to help her husband with the home expenses, began a business four years ago. She has a small dining room in which she prepares delicious dishes. She works from Monday through Saturday, from 5:00 until 14:00. She works with the help of her children selling and attending to customers. It has always gone well for her since her customers prefer her because of the seasoning that she puts in her dishes.

She will use this loan to purchase fish, conchas (local mollusks), shrimp, etc. for her husband’s business. She has been in the credit group for a year and a half, and she likes it because the group is united and the loans have low interest rates.

loans.use: to purchase fish, conchas (local mollusks), shrimp, etc.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 59 years old and married with four children.

Marcelina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Marcelina has borrowed and paid 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

Marcelina aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Leslie

texts.en:
Leslie is 56 years old and widowed with six children. 

Leslie is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Leslie requested a 40,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

Leslie has been in pig fattening for 17 years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Leslie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes works hard to support her family. Lourdes is married and has a livestock-raising business in the Philippines.

Lourdes requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines for her livestock.

Lourdes has been in this business for 10 years now.

Lourdes would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and vaccines for her livestock

loans.name: Marissa

texts.en:
Marissa is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Marissa is 24 years old now.

Marissa has a meat-vending business in the Philippines. Marissa requested a 5,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy additional stock of meat to sell.

Marissa has been in this business for one year. In the future, Marissa would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of meat to sell

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 54 years old and married with three children. 

Maria is in the agricultural business of raising livestock in the Philippines. Maria requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her livestock.
